forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 14 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun begins to dip into the horizon, the ambiance of Downtown San Francisco unfolds under a canvas inviting serenity. The forecast speaks of a sunny afternoon, yet a gentle marine layer rolls in, blurring the edges of the iconic skyline with a soft embrace. The temperature, while mild, suggests a light chill clings to the air, especially as the evening descends. The wind rustles through the streets, a companion that carries whispers of the bay, making it a day for light jackets or cozy sweaters as shadows stretch across the pavement.

The cloud cover tonight will transform the sky into a tapestry of soft grays, providing an enchanting backdrop for evening strolls along the waterfront. As the sun sets, it becomes an ideal time to enjoy a leisurely meal at one of the many outdoor cafes, or perhaps sip a warm beverage while watching the light dance across the water. A sense of calm permeates the city, making it an inviting moment to explore hidden spots or simply unwind in the embrace of the city's charm.
